title: A is for architecture [edited version]
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Robert Verrall and Gerald Budner
brief_description: An edited version of “A is for Architecture”. A panorama of ancient cities, palaces and temples whose splendour awed the eyes of all mankind - recreated in colour by the skill of the animation artist. In documenting the changing concepts in architecture through the ages, the film moves from one tradition to another, illustrating how each reflects the sentiments and values of the time, from the massive temples of the Pharaohs to the soaring skyscrapers of today.
